Posts.Content: Aug 30, 2009 08:28PM diptiadhyaru wrote: hi m dipti new to the community. was diagnosed with labc stage 3. got neo as wellas pre adjuvunt chemotherapy along with complete masectomy of my left breast nd 5 weeks of radiation.my lymphnodes were affected 17 out of 21 was the report. anyway since i was premenopausal they have startedme on tamoxifin.my erpr was strong positive.. but they consider me in a high risk factor bcause of the lymphnodes being affected.i believe state of mind as in being positive does help. herceptin was also considered but looking at the logistics it was may be helping 2percent.so v took the option of tamoxifin.come november it would b my 1 yr after radiation nd stopping all treatment
Posts.Title: Large amount of nodes removed and positive. michele54 London-Virginia
